>twentyforty at 2010-03-12 07:57 CET: 

@pdas544: For the same reasons you've mentioned I must restrain myself in upload of such long, big movies. Godfather trilogy is already available in small-sized formats, on like zillion places. Just Google.

I just wanted to thank you too twentyforty.. you're miraculous! I have slow download speed half the time because I've used up my bandwidth downloading huge-file-sized shows and my network slows me down, so discovering you has been a revelation! Thank you.. and I will continue to seed, as always.

I also love that you loved Life on Mars (as I read in a past comment on an old torrent) ..this isn't a request (I have LoM and A2A on DVD) - I just wanted to say I agre with you - it was magnificent television. 

Cheers.

@PirateTVshowz 

We are not interested. Go away and never come back.

One of the reasons these are poorly seeded could be that there is bandwidth capping which is also a reason people would want small sized files and not want to reach the download caps by uploading, in places like India. Blame the isp's not the users :D

@nicermog: Not true. Just another excuse.
As I said before, ONE of the reasons WHY I make files so small is because if people want to reach 1:1, it is much cheaper for files of 144MB, right? 
Get but give back... not as few hours earlier when "Pippa" get 17 Hit&Runs out of the first 28 who have finished download. 
Not as 72% of HIT&RUNS I get EVERY single day, no matter what I up - TV show, movie, oldie, piece of junk, cartoon, whatever. Anyone has seen how people vanish when they hit 100%. Be honest, to yourself, and do not spout nonsenses.


BUT... NOW true reason does not exist, except intrinsic flows of human nature... gathering, grabbing, be a swindler, a hustler, take a dump on someone's carpet and getaway with it, get for yourself but not to give others, share, care, empathy... I have more, you know? 

Your reasoning probably just reflects your character-flaws.

I agree with 20-40, in the past I use to download 350mb tv shows and uploaded 1.1 now since I found 20-40 my bandwidth  has been cut in half, I try to keep a ratio of 1.1 even thou my ratio is 1.1 or 1.2 in the end I am still saving bandwidth coz the files are so small, I just feel that if you can't share don't download it, and if you realy just come here to hit and run I think you would be better off goint to eztv. I always thank 20-40 for his uploads and add a +1 to the quality, I do this because I am really greatfull for all the hard work and time 20-40 puts into the torrents he uploads. So ill say it again.

THANK YOU MY FRIEND!!!!!!

@2040
No need to make it personal. I seed to well above 1x and i've uploaded enough torrents to know how hard it is to keep them seeded on a public tracker; I get reseed requests and then I restart them for a couple of weeks and then it turns out that I am the only seeder left yet again, so I can empathize with both sides :D
